Comment:
现在在北京的周边分部着大大小小的至少十几个滑雪场，一到周末个个都人满为患。
平均一个人去玩一次门票加租赁装备，大概开销在150-300人民币，一个家庭去一次开销在500人民币以上。

Video Caption: Beijing Winter Olympics: a Diplomatic Boycott? Big Deal, China Shrugs 當國外不看好北京冬奧會時，中國是怎麼用實際行動回應的？
Comment: Very impressive ski resort. The amount of wealth accumulated by the people there in a short amount of time is astonishing . Guizhou is one of the poorest area in China. There is an old saying my high school geography teach once said about this place “天无三日晴 地无三里平 人无三分银” （rough translation: The sky is always overcast, the landscape is rough to grow anything and people has no more than 3 pennies in their pockets).
